name: Latmos Explorer
description:
Discover the mystery of Latmos with block coding. Learn about the cultural heritage and history of humanity while preparing for the future.



Latmos Explorer is a block coding game that connects human heritage and history to the future. Build the foundation of engineers of the future with block coding, teaching the logic of coding to your children, simultaneously with cultural heritage and history. Let your children enjoy better quality screen time with safe and educational content of Latmos Explorer. Discover the ancient cities, 8.000 years old cave paintings and 550 millions years old gneiss rocks, cultural and natural heritage of the Latmos area.


-Block Coding

-Unique designs and character

-Real places from real world

-Quality time with quality context

-Safe and educational content

-Foundation of coding and engineering

-Improves analytical and mathematical skills of children

-Cultural heritage and safeguarding

-Teaches about recycling and waste management
